sentence.Network_en: Greece came next -- the Corinth Canal, and then a new kind of hell.
sentence.Network_cn: 接下来他参加攻打希腊科林斯运河的战斗.不久, 又到了另一个倒霉的地方.

sentence.Network_en: Christians in Corinth, an important commercial city in Greece.
sentence.Network_cn: 保罗写信给哥林多的信徒, 哥林多是希腊的一个商业重镇.

sentence.Network_en: Now in closing he speaks about his future plans Corinth.
sentence.Network_cn: 他在书信的结尾部分谈及他的未来计划.
